REPORT.name: Трафик по аккаунтам
REPORT.description: Name: Отчет по трафику, показывает объем в МБ по аккаунтам за указанный интервал времени Author: NodaSoft E-mail: support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code:
if object_id('tempdb..#tta') is not null DROP TABLE #tta
CREATE TABLE #tta ( [id] [int] IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL , [account] [varchar] (50) COLLATE Cyrillic_General_CI_AS NULL, [traffic_MB] [numeric] (12,2) NULL, [traffic_KB] [numeric] (12,2) NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
insert into #tta (account, traffic_MB, traffic_KB) select N'Итого:', sum(Traffic)/1024/1024 [traffic in MB], sum(Traffic)/1024 [traffic in KB] from Sessions inner join SessionsAdd on (SessionsAdd.idSessions = Sessions.id) inner join Accounts on (Sessions.idClients = Accounts.id) where Sessions.[started] > %TIME-START% and Sessions.[started] < %TIME-STOP%
insert into #tta (account, traffic_MB, traffic_KB) values (N'---------------', 0, 0)
insert into #tta (account, traffic_MB, traffic_KB) select Accounts.name, sum(Traffic)/1024/1024 [traffic in MB], sum(Traffic)/1024 [traffic in KB] from Sessions inner join SessionsAdd on (SessionsAdd.idSessions = Sessions.id) inner join Accounts on (Sessions.idClients = Accounts.id) where Sessions.[started] > %TIME-START% and Sessions.[started] < %TIME-STOP% group by Accounts.name order by [traffic in MB] desc
SELECT account [Account], traffic_MB [traffic in MB], traffic_KB [traffic in KB] FROM #tta
